short_summary: Meat, Fish and Poultry for Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada.
description: The contract  for supply of meat, fish and poultry will begin on 2024-02-29.  The delivery will be required for both static kitchens, as well as DND and CCG vessels. The selected vendor will have a three year contract with a base year plus two additional optional years. The vendor worldwide total annual requirement for the duration of the contract is 303,059 units.  The contract award method used for the procurement is "Lowest Price".
full_summary:
# Government Contract Opportunity

**Solicitation Title**
E6HAL-230001: Meat, Fish, and Poultry Supply

**Reference Number**
WS3835549511

**Issuance Date**
Publication Date: February 2, 2023

**Closing Date**
Tender Closing Date: February 24, 2023 at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Contract Term**
Supply contract with a one-year term, with an option to renew

**Deliverables**
Meat, fish, and poultry supply to static kitchens, and Department of National Defence (DND) and Coast Guard (CCG) vessels in Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador

**Evaluation Criteria**
The lowest priced bid will be selected, with award based on a single criteria evaluation process

**Notice URL**
View the solicitation document: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15302957](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15302957)

**Key Contact Information**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
Phone: [Not provided]
Email: [tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
